name: CreateImportForDataUpload
description:
Create a new import to upload and manage your data in Websets.

This tool creates an import for uploading data to Websets, enabling data enrichment, agentic search, and exclusion of duplicate results. The response includes an upload URL and a validity period for data submission.

parameters.name: import_data_details
parameters.description: JSON structure containing details about the data to upload, including fields for enrichment, search, and exclusion options.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the exa_search API.
